com.andresjesse.jpctblend

Class JPCTBlendScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andresjesse.jpctblend.JPCTBlendScene

  • public class JPCTBlendScene
extends java.lang.Object
    JPCTBlendScene Class. This class is the JPCTBlend Core, it loads and manages an exported scene.
    Author:
    andres

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      JPCTBlendScene(java.lang.String sceneFilename, com.threed.jpct.World world)
      JPCTScene constructor, loads an scene based on the main xml file (exported by blender)

      • addSceneToWorld

        public void addSceneToWorld()
        Adds everything to the world.

      • removeSceneFromWorld

        public void removeSceneFromWorld()
        Removes everything to the world. Reset camera pos/lookAt.

      • update

        public void update()
        Update all JPCTBlend objects and fixes rotationPivot after build(); Actors are updated in the scene by calling the "act" method for each one.

      • findSubNode

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node findSubNode(java.lang.String name,
                           org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Method from: http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/1.4/tutorial/doc/JAXPDOM7.html Find the named subnode in a node's sublist.
      • Ignores comments and processing instructions.
      • Ignores TEXT nodes (likely to exist and contain ignorable whitespace, if not validating.
      • Ignores CDATA nodes and EntityRef nodes.
      • Examines element nodes to find one with the specified name.
Parameters:
name - the tag name for the element to find
node - the element node to start searching from
Returns:
the Node found
